title: Stardew Valley: Where to Find a Sandfish + All Uses

steps.title: Sandfish can be found in the Desert, 6 AM to 8 PM, in all seasons.
steps.content: Sandfish can be found in the Desert, 6 AM to 8 PM, in all seasons. You can find a small pond located in front of the Skull Cavern's entrance. Fishing in this pond during the mentioned hours will let you reel in either a Sandfish or Scorpion Carp. [1] X Research source To unlock the Desert, you'll need to complete the Vault bundles in the Community Center . This repairs the Bus Station. If you don't have the Desert unlocked, Sandfish may be found randomly in the Traveling Cart.

steps.title: Sandfish can be gifted to Penny as a loved gift.
steps.content: Sandfish can be gifted to Penny as a loved gift. You can also gift Demetrius, Elliott, Leo, Linus, Pam, Sebastian, and Willy as a neutral gift.

steps.title: Use the Sandfish for the Speciality Fish Bundle.
steps.content: Use the Sandfish for the Speciality Fish Bundle. This bundle is located near the Fish Tank. Finishing this bundle awards you five (5) Dish O' The Sea.

steps.title: You can use Sandfish to make recipes.
steps.content: You can use Sandfish to make recipes. There are three cooking recipes total that can use Sandfish: Maki Roll Quality Fertilizer Sashimi

steps.title: Use Sandfish to make a Fish Shirt.
steps.content: Use Sandfish to make a Fish Shirt. You can use the Sewing Machine in Emily's and Haley's house along with some Cloth . Sandfish can also be used as a yellow dye.

steps.title: Sandfish can be placed in a Fish Pond.
steps.content: Sandfish can be placed in a Fish Pond. When the capacity is increased to 10, the primary output will be yellow Sandfish Roe with a small chance for Cactus Seeds.

steps.title: Sandfish is used in a few quests.
steps.content: Sandfish is used in a few quests. These quests can be found at the "Help Wanted" board outside of Pierre's store or at the Special Orders board near the Lewis' house.
